title: Mike Poto
text: Mike Poto (born 15 January 1981) is a <a href="Zambian">Zambian</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> goalkeeper who played for <a href="Green%20Buffaloes">Green Buffaloes</a> in Zambia. He has played for the <a href="Zambia%20national%20football%20team">Zambian national team</a>.
